channel.title: Updating the forum
channel.description:
Well, this was posted in the Moparscape Vet Talk but I believe everyone should be able to comment on this and that Moparisthebest will probably look at it here.
[quote="ry60003333, post:1, topic:206704"]The forum has gotten just a little outdated. SMF 1.1.5 came out not too long ago, and SMF 2.0 Beta also came out a while back. I'm guessing there are Modifications installed that might make upgrading harder, but updating to 1.1.5 isn't rocket science. Also, 2.0 has some great administration features that would really prove useful to the Moderators, and I'm hoping the banning system has been improved. I think 1.1.5 would do for now though, and 2.0 should wait until it is no longer in Beta form. I recommend trying 2.0 Beta for yourself, it has worked well for me. (So far :P)
But since this is a highly loaded forum, keeping updated is a good idea. Also, the RuneScape © 1999-2006, Jagex Ltd. at the bottom should probably be changed to 1999-2008.[/quote]

item.title: Updating the forum
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:29, topic:206721”]Err what has the update got to do with the themes, there are thousands of themes that work with smf from the first versions upto the current.

Yeah I know about that option Thug, I just love the default SMF skin, or theme. I meant a better version of this theme. New icons and the like.

Go ahead and restyle it for him then, because i know for a fact moparisthebest already has a job keeping up with all the requests he gets.[/quote]
He only gets one request or rather should only respond to one request:

Forums that don’t crash.

Read full topic

@davidude36 wrote:

So does anyone know when 2.0 will be out of Beta? Or is it a sort of “Will be released when they have fixed all the bugs”, which basically means: No idea.

Sorry I couldn’t be bothered to Google the answer, I thought it may spark more discussion.
